NTNU EMI Talent and Leadership Course Summer Program Presentation

ğŸ‰ğŸŠ Congratulations to Ying-Chu Chen for his outstanding performance in the 2025 NTNU EMI Teaching Resource Center 113-2 Summer Program [EMI Talent and Leadership Course]! ğŸ¥³ğŸŒŸ

Ying-Chu showcased excellent English presentation skills and strong leadership abilities, earning high praise from the judges with his well-prepared presentationğŸ‘.
His dedication and expertise not only brought him personal honor but also added prestige to the EMI Teaching Resource Centerâœ¨.
